resources.string: My name is Derrick Kyle Ward. I am a Computer Engineer (BS, Working on MS). I am West Indian and my family hails from the countries of Barbados and St. Vincent. I currently work as a Software Engineer. I enjoy reading autobiographies, science-fiction, cyberpunk, and historical non-fiction. My favorites sports to play are ping pong and basketball. I hope you enjoy the game. Its my first published one. I will continue to iterate and improve.
Block Match needs access to camera in order for you to take a profile photo. Please update Block Match\'s permissions from phone settings.
Block Match needs access to your storage in order for you to select a profile photo from your existing photos. Please update Block Match\'s permissions from phone settings.
